question: Which of the following suggest a psychotic rather than an organic disorder?
exp: ANSWER: (D) Lack of insight. REF: Kaplan 9th ed p. 334. Presenting symptoms of organic mental illnesses: Visual or auditory hallucination. Complex delusions. Soft neurological signs. Loss of consciousness. Misidentification. History of head injury. Concurrent medical/neurological history. Lack of insight is never seen in organic mental disease
